verses.verse: Then Yahweh<WH3068> answered<WH6030> Job<WH347> out of the whirlwind,<WH5591>
"Who is this who darkens<WH2821> counsel<WH6098> by words<WH4405> without knowledge?<WH1847>
Brace<WH247> yourself<WH2504> like a man,<WH1397> for I will question<WH7592> you,<WH3045> then you answer me!
"Where<WH375> were you when I laid the foundations<WH3245> of the earth?<WH776> Declare,<WH5046> if you have<WH3045> understanding.<WH998>
Who determined<WH7760> its measures,<WH4461> if you know?<WH3045> Or who stretched<WH5186> the line on it?<WH6957>
Whereupon were its foundations<WH134> fastened?<WH2883> Or who laid<WH3384> its<WH6438> cornerstone,<WH68>
when the morning<WH1242> stars<WH3556> sang<WH7442> together,<WH3162> and all the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> shouted for joy?<WH7321>
"Or who shut up<WH5526> the sea<WH3220> with doors,<WH1817> when it broke forth<WH1518> from<WH3318> the womb,<WH7358>
when I made<WH7760> clouds<WH6051> its garment,<WH3830> and wrapped<WH2854> it in thick darkness,<WH6205>
marked<WH7665> out for it my bound,<WH2706> set<WH7760> bars<WH1280> and doors,<WH1817>
and said,<WH559> <WH5704> 'Here you may come,<WH935> but no further.<WH3254> Here your proud<WH1347> waves<WH1530> shall be stayed?<WH7896>'
"Have you commanded<WH6680> the morning<WH1242> in your days,<WH3117> and caused the dawn<WH7837> to know<WH3045> its place;<WH4725>
that it might take hold<WH270> of the ends<WH3671> of the earth,<WH776> and shake the wicked<WH7563> out of it?<WH5287>
It is changed<WH2015> as clay<WH2563> under the seal,<WH2368> and stands<WH3320> forth as a garment.<WH3830>
From the wicked,<WH7563> their light<WH216> is withheld.<WH4513> The high<WH7311> arm<WH2220> is broken.<WH7665>
"Have you entered<WH935> into the springs<WH5033> of the sea?<WH3220> Or have you walked<WH1980> in the recesses<WH2714> of the deep?<WH8415>
Have the gates<WH8179> of death<WH4194> been revealed<WH1540> to you?<WH7200> Or have you seen the gates<WH8179> of the shadow of death?<WH6757>
Have you comprehended<WH995> the earth<WH776> in its breadth?<WH7338> Declare,<WH5046> if you know it all.<WH3045>
"What is the way<WH1870> to the dwelling<WH7931> of light?<WH216> As for darkness,<WH2822> where is its place,<WH4725>
that you should take<WH3947> it to its bound,<WH1366> that you should discern<WH995> the paths<WH5410> to its house?<WH1004>
Surely you know,<WH3045> for you were born<WH3205> then,<WH4557> and the number of your days<WH3117> is great!<WH7227>
Have you entered<WH935> the treasuries<WH214> of the snow,<WH7950> or have you seen<WH7200> the treasures<WH214> of the hail,<WH1259>
which I have reserved<WH2820> against the time<WH6256> of trouble,<WH6862> against the day<WH3117> of battle<WH7128> and war?<WH7128>
By what<WH335> way<WH1870> is the lightning<WH216> distributed,<WH216> or the east wind<WH6921> scattered<WH6327> on the earth?<WH776>
Who has cut<WH6385> a channel<WH8585> for the flood water,<WH7858> or the path<WH1870> for the<WH2385> thunderstorm;<WH6963>
To cause it to rain<WH4305> on a land<WH776> where no man<WH376> is;<WH4057> on the wilderness, in which there is no man;<WH120>
to satisfy<WH7646> the waste<WH4875> and desolate<WH7722> ground,<WH4161> to cause the tender grass<WH1877> to spring forth?<WH6779>
Does the rain<WH4306> have<WH3426> a father?<WH1> Or who fathers<WH3205> the drops<WH96> of dew?<WH2919>
Out of whose womb<WH990> came<WH3318> the ice?<WH7140> The gray frost<WH3713> of the sky,<WH8064> who has given birth to it?<WH3205>
The waters<WH4325> become hard<WH2244> like stone,<WH68> when the surface<WH6440> of the deep<WH8415> is frozen.<WH3920>
"Can you bind<WH7194> the cluster<WH4575> of the Pleiades,<WH3598> or loosen<WH6605> the cords<WH4189> of Orion?<WH3685>
Can you lead forth<WH3318> the constellations<WH4216> in their season?<WH6256> Or can you guide<WH5148> the Bear<WH5906> with her cubs?<WH1121>
Do you know<WH3045> the laws<WH2708> of the heavens?<WH8064> Can you establish<WH7760> its dominion<WH4896> over the earth?<WH776>
"Can you lift up<WH7311> your voice<WH6963> to the clouds,<WH5645> That abundance<WH8229> of waters<WH4325> may cover you?<WH3680>
Can you send<WH7971> forth lightnings,<WH1300> that they may go?<WH3212> Do they report to you,<WH559> 'Here we are?'
Who has put<WH7896> wisdom<WH2451> in the inward parts?<WH2910> Or who has given<WH5414> understanding<WH998> to the mind?<WH7907>
Who can number<WH5608> the clouds<WH7834> by wisdom?<WH2451> Or who can pour<WH7901> out the bottles<WH5035> of the sky,<WH8064>
when the dust<WH6083> runs<WH3332> into a mass,<WH4165> and the clods<WH7263> of earth stick together?<WH1692>
"Can you hunt<WH6679> the prey<WH2964> for the lioness,<WH3833> or satisfy<WH4390> the appetite<WH2416> of the young lions,<WH3715>
when they crouch<WH7817> in their dens,<WH4585> <WH3427> and<WH3926> lie in wait<WH695> in the thicket?<WH5521>
Who provides<WH3559> for the raven<WH6158> his prey,<WH6718> when his young ones<WH3206> cry<WH7768> to God,<WH410> and wander<WH8582> for lack<WH1097> of food?<WH400>
